description: The devoted sister of mad scientist Ginias Saharin, Aina serves in a semi-official capacity as a Zeon test pilot. Shortly after she encounters Shiro Amada during a test flight in Earth orbit, Aina travels to Earth to help her brother with his newest project. Little does Aina suspect that she`ll encounter Shiro again, or that her loyalty to her brother and his cause is about to be tested for the first time...
name: Aina Saharin
